column5: Recent upgrades are first class! Contemporary, fully-furnished condo on the water. Swimming pool on site. Wi-Fi and big screen TV. Fully-stocked with linens, soaps, paper towels, utensils and most of what you will need, as well as a fully-stocked kitchen. Bottom floor makes this condo very convenient to access from the front or walk 50 feet to the water in the back. Great fishing right out your back door.
column8: The Blue View on Lake Conroe
